name: Cero (James Prowse)
description:
Cero is a  top-down, 2D pixel art, 4v4 multiplayer, action-RPG, MOBA.
MOBA is the core inspiration, but add elements of capture the flag.

This is a solo project made in 3 mouths and is a prototype for a future game made by James Prowse (Flaming Scarecrow).

This Prototype build is only a 1v1 version and works best with two controllers.
